labels.name: story
labels.value: User scrolls down and clicks the Top of Page button to return to the top

name: TC-34 | Verify that clicking the 'Top of Page' button scrolls the page up to the top of the home page.
description:
Test Objective: Ensure the 'Back-to-Top' button scrolls the user smoothly to the top of the page.
Steps:
1) Scroll far down to make the button appear
2)Check button is visible
3) Click it
4) Confirm scroll to top by checking scroll position or element visibility
Expected Result: The page should scroll smoothly to the top of the home page (i.e., the user should be returned to the top of the page after clicking the "Top of Page" button).

steps.name: 🔽 Scrolled to bottom of the page
🧭 Scrolled to element: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (8f76b8625fe54128749069214e8bac02)] -> xpath: //div[contains(@class,'back-to-top-btn')]//button[span[contains(@class,'pi-angle-up')]]]
✅ Page scrolled to the top successfully
📥 تم تحميل ملف الإعدادات بنجاح من config.properties
